subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Sylvester Stallone, along with Mike Tyson and Julio Cesar Chavez, was named to the 12-member 2011 class for induction into the International Boxing Hall of Fame and Museum.
snippet: Sylvester Stallone, along with Mike Tyson and Julio Cesar Chavez, was named to the 12-member 2011 class for induction into the International Boxing Hall of Fame and Museum.
